attributes.action: Give British residents £1m each to ease the economic burden,than to add another £2.7b to UK debt burden, to increase tax allowance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many British residents would come out of poverty/benefits over night, pay off their mortgages, clear credit card debt,indulge in consumer spending and save for their pension knowing that a million pounds from Gordon Brown would ease all the inflation and recession situation that the Bank of England is forcasting for the next two years.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
